body.name: Listerine Ultraclean Oral Care Antiseptic Mouthwash to Help Fight Bad Breath Germs, Gingivitis, Plaque and Tartar, Oral Rinse for Healthy Gums & Fresh Breath, Cool Mint Flavor, 500 mL (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
FREE pickup Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
features: ANTISEPTIC MOUTHWASH: Value pack of 2-pack of 500-mL bottles of Listerine Ultraclean Cool Mint Mouthwash helps kill 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque & gingivitis & provides up to 3x longer lasting clean feeling versus brushing alone
CONTROL Tartar BUILDUP: Oral care mouthwash has the benefits of original Listerine Antiseptic Mouthwash with an added tartar control ingredient to fight buildup for cleaner teeth
WHOLE MOUTH CLEAN: Gum care mouthwash maintains healthy gums & helps with gingivitis treatment while providing fresh breath and a dentist-clean, fresh feeling that lasts for hours
Listerine Whitening is no longer available. We recommend you try Listerine Ultraclean which helps keep your teeth naturally white
PROTECT DAY AND NIGHT: Achieve maximum results from this fresh breath mouthwash by rinsing mouth for 30 seconds twice a day, both morning & night, & experience a refreshing, dentist-clean feeling
body.description: Give your mouth a powerful, dentist-clean feeling with Listerine Ultraclean Antiseptic Mouthwash with refreshing Cool Mint flavor for gingivitis treatment. This oral care mouthwash is clinically proven to fight tartar buildup & kill 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque & gingivitis & provides up to 3x longer lasting clean feeling versus brushing alone. This tartar control mouthwash helps maintain healthy gums & fresh breath with an added anti-tartar ingredient for cleaner teeth & 4x healthier gums in 3 weeks vs. brushing alone. The Cool Mint flavor of the oral rinse combined with Listerine Everfresh technology will keep your breath fresh & your mouth feeling clean up to 3x longer than brushing alone. Accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA), achieve maximum results by rinsing with this mouthwash for 30 seconds twice a day. We recommend you try Listerine Ultraclean which helps keep your teeth naturally white.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash offers that long-lasting powerful dentist-clean feeling. With clinically proven ingredients to control tartar buildup and help keep your teeth naturally white. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day provides 24-hour protection against plaque and gingivitis germs. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash offers that long-lasting powerful dentist-clean feeling. With clinically proven ingredients to control tartar buildup and help keep your teeth naturally white. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day provides 24-hour protection against plaque and gingivitis germs. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash offers that long-lasting powerful dentist-clean feeling. With clinically proven ingredients to control tartar buildup and help keep your teeth naturally white. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day provides 24-hour protection against plaque and gingivitis germs.

HEALTHIER GUMS Rinsing with LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash gets 4x healthier gums in just 3 weeks, according to a clinical study. A DEEPER CLEAN LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash includes EVERFRESH technology for a powerful dentist-clean feeling that lasts for hours. PROTECT AGAINST TARTAR BUILDUP LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN is formulated with zinc chloride, which controls tartar buildup, helping keep your teeth naturally white. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. Don't be shy to ask your dentist/hygienist about best oral care habits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST Listerine formula out there.
reviews.reviewText: This was the mouthwash used by my dentist, so I bought it as it worked so well after a cleaning. It's a bit hard to find as not all stores carry it, though it's very available on-line.The most amazing thing I noted was that, after having my teeth cleaned, and after brushing morning and night, and flossing at night as well, I was waking up with almost NO feeling of that coating of bacteria and plaque on my teeth or tongue in the morning. And that went on for almost 3 months. I've NEVER had that great of an effect from a mouthwash in my LIFE.Now, it's a bit rough to swish for a full 30 seconds, (which, according to my dentist, is the minimum length of time you need to swish for the stuff to even work). It does burn. It'll help to stop swishing and just hold it in your mouth when the burning sensation gets too bad. That will calm the sensation down, but will still be soaking your mouth. Then start swishing again as the burn fades.I've even dipped my flossers into this as I do each tooth. (My dentist said that wasn't necessary, but this stuff works so well I figured I might as well get it all they way up under my gums.) So VERY worth the money!It will NOT work especially well if you do not brush and floss first and swish for at least 30 seconds. Just use it correctly; don't fight the product.HIGHLY RECOMMEND, BUT USE PROPERLY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is excellent, description is misleading
reviews.reviewText: I started to use this mouthwash because it was used by a number of dentists and hygienists that I have used or that I know. The fact that it fights tartar was a key to my decision, as I want as much protection from tooth and gum disease as possible. This mouthwash does it all.The only caveat I would like to point out is that the description makes it look like the 2 pack is of two 33.814-ounce bottles. It actually is a 2 pack of 16-ounce bottles and the pictures in the description do indeed show the bottles are 500ml/16 ounces.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size was disappointing
reviews.reviewText: I love this product but didn't look at the size when I ordered. I received 2 small bottles instead of my usual large size. Oh well, I'm still going to use them and will just be more careful when ordering next time.
